ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Otter hunting
ygData.msgSnippet: Not sure on the lvl but I know he told me that my enchanter and his warrior were still getting exp from the mobs at 56 and 58 respectively.   From what I
ygData.messageBody:
Not sure on the lvl but I know he told me that my enchanter and his warrior
were still getting exp from the mobs at 56 and 58 respectively. From what
I understand its a good exp place for a group around 51 to mid 50's or a bit
higher. Jeff?



Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: Rebecca Small [mailto:rsmall@...]
Sent: Friday, August 24, 2001 10:24 PM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Otter hunting


Thanks for the info Jeff! I was mainly interested in the factions and drop
rate. This is for my DE wiz btw, not my bard. My evil cleric hubby talked me
into doing the Coldain Shawl quest and I will need high tailoring for that.
DE's don't get cultural tailoring so that left velious for the higher skill
levels. The fact that she may be able to make some pps while hunting is a
plus, maybe I can make a dent in the +5k pp deficit the trade skill work up
for this quest has cost me. One further question: you mention the Chief
being L60, but about what level are the other dogs? I have yet to go get
the CS tooth for my wiz so haven't been able to con anything in CS. I'm
trying to get non kos to dragons so I can start her Giant Bane spell quest
in the near future. Dwarvves already think "you're one of the most highly
reguarded dark elves", lol!

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe, 58 bard and silk collector extrordinaire!
Brilinia Iliside 48 wiz who's spent way too much time combining things
Venator Sapentia, Xegony
